name: Pirates Locker
description:
Quick vertical slice for Ludum Dare 50.  Its not much, but its mine! Done in about 6 hours of work, so be nice! HAHA   

Your crew threw you overboard in mutiny.  You ARE going to meet Davy Jones!

How long can you cling to life and prolong the inevitable?

To Play:

Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

Collecting air bubbles will increase your breath bar.

Watch out for jelly fish! Their sting may give you double the movement speed, but it hurts…..ALOT!

How Long Can You Survive??
